name: Onimo
description:
A sumo game of one-eyed monsters.

Easy to play, difficult to master. Take control of your own Onimo and compete against other players to become the best.

Proof-of-concept instructions:

The game is in a simple state.

  • Mouse/Touch
    • Click/tap in the direction you wish to move
  • Controller
    • Left analogue stick (direction)
    • A (Xbox) or X (Playstation) to move

There is currently no 'win-state'. Once there is only one Onimo left standing (all others out of lives) you will have to go back to the menu to play again.

Feedback would be much appreciated. Please leave a comment to let me know how the game feels to play, what you would change, what customisation options you'd like, how much you'd like to play online, etc.

Game modes:

  • Onimo
    • A sumo-style game. Knock your opponent out of the ring to win.
  • Oniball (not present in current build)
    • Two goals, two teams, and a ball. Knock the ball into the opponent's goal to score points.
